welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Ana, Philippines! Get ready to be enchanted by our beautiful beaches, rich cultural heritage, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal exclusively for Philippine Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small terminal for domestic flights operated by low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
